title: Full-time Revenue Management Associate
job_overview:
We are looking for a full-time revenue management associate for an AI start-up based in the United States. 

Pay: PHP 34000 per month
Timings: 11PM to 7AM Manila time (night shift), Monday to Friday

Responsibilities:
- Assisting with KPI dashboard creation in CRM systems to report on the sales process and its health
- Communicating with warm leads & potential clients (eg. answering questions, following up after a call, shepherding leads through sales pipeline, etc.)
- Creating proposals based on recorded sales calls
- Serving as an executive assistant (calendar/scheduling management) to the company's CEO and main salesperson
- Managing/update CRMs (ActiveCampaign) and creating reports/documentation 
- Any other sales/revenue related tasks the client finds necessary

Requirements:
- 2-4 years experience in the sales management/sales assistant role at a start-up required
- Experience with CRM systems like ActiveCampaign required
- Experience in proposal writing required
- Experience in customer outreach required
- Experience with AI/tech start-ups is a major plus
